creator: olivier.bedelet@med.ge.com
text:
Each time the dialog box "Load Events from XML file..." is open a line "XML
files (*.xml)" is added in the "Files of type" drop down list

How to reproduce
launch chainsaw
select menu item File-> Load Log4j File...
Click on the drop down list "Files of type"
Two lines are displayed
All Files
XML files (*.xml)
Click on Cancel
select menu item File-> Load Log4j File...
Click on the drop down list "Files of type"
Three lines are displayed
All Files
XML files (*.xml)
XML files (*.xml)
